textBeforeTable: Fact table that stores event information captured by the Analytics service when someone creates a page. I.2.1 ASFACT_WC_PAGECRE_0 This section describes each of the tables listed in Table I-1, "Analytics Facts Tables (Prefixed ASFACT_WC)". Analytics fact tables are created when the Analytics Collector runs for the first time. Each fact table stores a specific event type, for example, page views, Space views, document uploads, blog views, wiki edits, and so on. Columns in these fact table mostly contain integer IDs that reference descriptive data stored in dimension tables. I.2 Analytics Fact Table Descriptions ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__7 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTDELETES ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__6 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTCOMMENT ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__5 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTLIKE ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__4 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTTAG ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__3 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTEDIT ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__2 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTCREATE ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__1 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTDOWNLOADS ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB__0 {HTTP://WWW.ORACLE.COM/ANALYTICS/WC}DOCLIB_DOCUMENTVIEWS ----------------------------------------- Table Name Event Display Name  Sample Report Output ORDER BY 1; WHERE tablename like 'ASFACT_WC_DOCLIB%' FROM assys_events displayname "Event Display Name" SELECT tablename "Table Name",  This section provides a sample SQL query to return the names of tables associated with a specific event. This query uses a filter to return tables associated with the Documents service.
